seo: ThinkPHP,任意文件写入,RCE,目录穿越,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测ThinkPHP框架中的语言包任意文件写入漏洞，通过构造特定请求实现远程代码执行（RCE），并提供一键getshell功能。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect arbitrary file write vulnerabilities in the ThinkPHP framework's language pack. It achieves Remote Code Execution (RCE) by crafting specific requests and provides a one-click getshell feature.
